full_summary:
### Tender Announcement - SAP Professional Services

#### Tender Information

* **Tender Reference Number**: PW-23-01022878
* **Publication Date**: January 24, 2023
* **Closing Date and Time**: February 8, 2023, at 12:00 PM Eastern Time

#### Brief Description of the Tender

The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites bidders to provide professional services for the provision of Information Management/Information Technology (IM/IT) resources with expertise to support AAFC's SAP Centre of Expertise, including Cluster Partners.

The successful bidder will be required to provide functional and technical SAP resources, as well as resources with enterprise architecture and project management expertise. The estimated duration of the contract is from contract award to March 31, 2024.

#### Pre-Requisites and Selection Criteria

* Bidding is restricted to TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region.
* The bidder must have expertise in the following categories:
	+ Resources
	+ A.2 ERP Functional Analyst 1 (Asset Accounting/Plant Management) Level 2
	+ A.2 ERP Functional Analyst 2 (Materiel Management) Level 2
	+ A.2 ERP Functional Analyst 3 (Security and Access) Level 2
	+ A.3 ERP Programmer Analyst 1 (SAP) Level 2
	+ A.3 ERP Programmer Analyst 2 (SAP) Level 3
	+ A.5 ERP Technical Analyst 1 (BASIS) Level 2
	+ A.5 ERP Technical Analyst 2 (BASIS) Level 3
	+ A.5 ERP Technical Analyst 3 (uPerform/Enable) Level 3
	+ P.9 Project Manager Level 3
	+ P.2 Enterprise Architect Level 3
* The bidder must have a minimum corporate security level of Secret and a minimum resource-level security of Secret.

#### Key Dates

* The tender closing date is February 8, 2023, at 12:00 PM Eastern Time.
* The estimated contract duration is from contract award to March 31, 2024.

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**: Eleana Duff, [eleana.duff@agr.gc.ca](mailto:eleana.duff@agr.gc.ca) or 1.888.850.3996. pwd
